pkgmetadata.longdescription: Grab Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Flat Files // Designed to query Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) workplace/residential association and origin-destination flat files and optionally aggregate Census block-level data to block group, tract, county, or state. Data comes from the LODES FTP server https://lehd.ces.census.gov/data/lodes/LODES8/.
